Name: Suspicious Shuffle
About the game: Mario Party meets Geometry Wars in this minigame adventure for 1-6 players! Play through a 1-6 player co-op campaign utilizing a diverse set of skills in a ever-Shuffling minigame fiesta! In the process, enjoy a light-hearted story involving the Suspicious Dealer and restoring balance to the universe. The stakes have never been lower! Is an adventure really complete without hats? Clearing the campaign rewards you with priceless Stars which can be used to unlock customisation options and get fancy! Sometimes we all need a break from helping one other to show off and find out who really is the very best. It'll be you, obviously. Mix and match your favorite minigames with modifiable settings to play them the way you like them, no judgement. Guaranteed fun or refund it in < 2 hours for 100% of your money back! Okay you got me, admittedly that's just a Steam Store rule but what I'm trying to say is: What'dya got to lose? Everybody get in here!
